import React, { useState } from "react"; import "../styles.css"; import Navbar from "../components/Navbar"; import Footer from "../components/Footer"; const Home = () => { const [cards, setCards] = useState([ { isHovered1: false }, { isHovered2: false }, { isHovered3: false }, { isHovered4: false }, { isHovered5: false }, { isHovered6: false }, { isClicked1: false }, { isClicked2: false }, { isClicked3: false }, { isClicked4: false }, { isClicked5: false }, { isClicked6: false }, ]); const handleMouseEnterCard = (index) => { const updatedCards = [...cards]; updatedCards[index].isHovered = true; setCards(updatedCards); }; const handleMouseLeaveCard = (index) => { const updatedCards = [...cards]; updatedCards[index] = false; setCards(updatedCards); }; const handleCardClick = (index) => { const updatedCards = [...cards]; updatedCards[index]= !updatedCards[index]; setCards(updatedCards); }; return ( <> {/* Introduction Section */}

{/* Room Section */}

Luxury Rooms

Standard

Our standard rooms offer chicly-designed interiors and a range of modern amenities to ensure that you enjoy a relaxed and comfortable stay.

Deluxe

Inspired by the vivid cultural history of Lahore, the Deluxe Room furnishes character with old-school charm.

Executive

Designed with chic and contemporary dcor, our Executive Room furnishes a King-sized bed, a spacious bathroom, a writing desk and a minibar.

Deluxe

Inspired by the vivid cultural history of Lahore, the Deluxe Room furnishes character with old-school charm.

Business Suite

Offering comfortable and classy living, our Business Suite creates a balance between work and comfort.

Deluxe Suite

Overlooking the beautiful city of Lahore, spacious Deluxe Suite is a blend of comfort and magnificence.
